article_title: Watch Bill Maher Tackle Ebola Panic And The 'Morons In That F--king Hospital In Dallas'
article_text: Bill Maher took on ebola panic on his show Friday night. “I’m not panicked, I’m just pissed," he said, tackling the incompetence in response to the crisis. He and guests David Miliband and David Frum debate the merits of a travel ban before Maher goes off on the "morons in that f--king hospital in Dallas." “They love their freedom down in Texas,” he said. “They don’t like rules and regulations and ‘tellin’ us what to do’ and revenuers and the federal government. What could go wrong? This.” Watch the clip above.

article_summary:
Bill Maher took on ebola panic on his show Friday night.
He and guests David Miliband and David Frum debate the merits of a travel ban before Maher goes off on the "morons in that f--king hospital in Dallas."
“I’m not panicked, I’m just pissed," he said, tackling the incompetence in response to the crisis.
“They don’t like rules and regulations and ‘tellin’ us what to do’ and revenuers and the federal government.
This.” Watch the clip above.
